exceptions.tactic: intros Hcoh HptInPts HptState Hinv pt' ps' r' lg' Hpt'InPts Hpt'State Hr'Eq Hlg'Eq.

exceptions.exn: In environment l : Label cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat lg : Log pt : nat_eqType H : coh d H0 : pt \\in pts H1 : pt_state d (r, PInit) lg pt H2 : Inv d pt' : nat_eqType ps' : PState r' : nat lg' : Log H3 : pt' \\in pts H4 : pt_state d (r', ps') lg' pt' H5 : r' = r Unable to unify "lg" with "lg'".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
r: nat
lg: Log
pt: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt_state d (r, PInit) lg pt -> Inv d -> forall (pt' : nat_eqType) (ps' : PState) (r' : nat) (lg' : Log), pt' \in pts -> pt_state d (r', ps') lg' pt' -> r' = r -> lg' = lg

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
pt_state = fun (d : dstatelet) (p : PStateT) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => loc pt d = st :-> p \+ log :-> l : dstatelet -> PStateT -> Log -> nid -> Prop
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
nid = nat : Set
Inductive PState : Set := PInit : PState | PGotRequest : data -> PState | PRespondedYes : data -> PState | PRespondedNo : data -> PState | PCommitted : data -> PState | PAborted : data -> PState
Inv = fun d : dstatelet => exists (round : nat) (l : Log), [\/ EverythingInit d round l, exists next_data : data, PhaseOne d round next_data l | exists next_data : data, PhaseTwo d round next_data l] : dstatelet -> Prop
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
p_matches_tag_internal_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (t : nat) (m : seq nat) (pt : nat_eqType) (r : nat) (ps : PState) (lg : Log), coh d -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> internal_msg t cn pt -> pt_state d (r, ps) lg pt -> Inv d -> p_matches_tag ps t
PhaseOne_PGotRequest_next_data_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt_state d (r, PGotRequest nd) lg pt -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PGotRequest next_data) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]
inv_aborted : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (this : nat_eqType) (Hthis : this \in nodes cn pts others), this \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hthis = (r, PAborted nd) -> Inv d -> exists lg : Log, PhaseTwo d r nd lg
inv_gotrequest : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (this : nat_eqType) (Hthis : this \in nodes cn pts others), this \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hthis = (r, PGotRequest nd) -> Inv d -> exists lg : Log, PhaseOne d r nd lg
inv_committed : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (this : nat_eqType) (Hthis : this \in nodes cn pts others), this \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hthis = (r, PCommitted nd) -> Inv d -> exists lg : Log, PhaseTwo d r nd lg
PhaseTwo_PAborted_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (Hpt : pt \in nodes cn pts others), pt \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hpt = (r, PAborted nd) -> PhaseTwo d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PAborted next_data) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
PhaseTwo_PCommitted_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data) (r : nat) (nd : data) (C : coh d) (Hpt : pt \in nodes cn pts others), pt \in pts -> getStP Hnin C Hpt = (r, PCommitted nd) -> PhaseTwo d round next_data lg -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
getStP_K : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : PStateT) (l : Log), n \in pts -> loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStP Hnin C pf = m
PhaseOne_round_pt : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nat_eqType) (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), pt \in pts -> PhaseOne d round next_data lg -> exists ps : PState, pt_state d (round, ps) lg pt
cohStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in pts -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (loc n d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = PStateT
getStP : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> PStateT
pt_state_functional : forall (d : dstatelet) (pt : nid) (ps1 : PStateT) (lg1 : Log) (ps2 : PStateT) (lg2 : Log), valid (loc pt d) -> pt_state d ps1 lg1 pt -> pt_state d ps2 lg2 pt -> ps1 = ps2 /\ lg1 = lg2
EverythingInit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) => cn_state d (round, CInit) l /\ (forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)]) : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> Prop Arguments EverythingInit _ _%nat_scope
this_not_pts : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
pt_state_soupE : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : soup) (h : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt n : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt != n -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} ps lg pt
pt_InitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt
inv_waitcommit : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (C : coh d) (next_data : data) (sent : seq nid), Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CWaitAckCommit next_data sent) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits d r next_data lg sent
inv_sentcommit : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (C : coh d) (next_data : data) (sent : seq nid), Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CSentCommit next_data sent) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits d r next_data lg sent
inv_sentabort : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (C : coh d) (next_data : data) (sent : seq nid), Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CSentAbort next_data sent) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts d r next_data lg sent
inv_waitabort : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (C : coh d) (next_data : data) (sent : seq nid), Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CWaitAckAbort next_data sent) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts d r next_data lg sent
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneReceive _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
pt_PhaseTwoRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : seq nat) (lg : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (this : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != this -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded {| dstate := upd this ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
inv_waitprep : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (C : coh d) (next_data : data) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)), Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseOneReceive d r next_data lg recvd
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat lg : Log pt : nat_eqType |- Type]
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
getStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> Log
abort_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = abort_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (false, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.abort_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
locCn : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> valid (loc n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (loc n d))
commit_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = commit_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg
prep_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = prep_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseOne d round next_data lg
abort_req_cn_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt : nat_eqType), tag m = abort_req -> pt \in pts -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> Inv d -> exists (round : nat) (lg : Log) (next_data : data), PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data lg
cohStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes cn pts others -> forall l : dynamic id, find log (loc n d) = Some l -> dyn_tp l = Log
pt_Init = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) l pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d)] : dstatelet -> nat -> Log -> nid -> Prop Arguments pt_Init _ _%nat_scope
cn_PhaseOneSend = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentPrep next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt else pt_Init d round l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneSend _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
prep_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PInit) lg pt, no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d) & msg_spec cn pt Exports.prep_req (round :: next_data) (dsoup d)]
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt

```coq
intros Hcoh HptInPts HptState Hinv pt' ps' r' lg' Hpt'InPts Hpt'State Hr'Eq Hlg'Eq.
apply (pt_state_functional d pt pt' (r, PInit) lg (r', ps') lg').
- apply Hpt'State.
- apply HptState.
- rewrite Hr'Eq. rewrite Hlg'Eq. reflexivity.
```

original: intros Hcoh HptInPts HptState Hinv pt' ps' r' lg' Hpt'InPts Hpt'State Hr'Eq Hlg'Eq. apply (pt_state_functional d pt pt' (r, PInit) lg (r', ps') lg'). - apply Hpt'State. - apply HptState. - rewrite Hr'Eq. rewrite Hlg'Eq. reflexivity.
